description:
Now, Ustwo Games releases Monument Valley 2, a 16-level follow up to the 2014 blockbuster. 现在，Ustwo游戏继2014年推出的《纪念碑谷1》，发布了《纪念碑谷2》， 总共16个关卡。

The game is like a funhouse mirror of the original: On the surface it looks and plays like the first Monument Valley, but a closer look reveals a deeper, smarter game than before. 《纪念碑谷2》就像《纪念碑谷1》的哈哈镜：表面上看起来和“1”一样，但是仔细观察后会发现“2”比“1”更有深度、更聪明。

The first thing you’ll notice about Monument Valley 2 is the familiarity. The opening scene features an avatar named Ro sitting atop a piece of geometric architecture.打开《纪念碑谷2》，你首先会感觉很熟悉。开场的场景是一个名叫Ro的小图标坐在一个几何建筑上。

Revisit the first game, and you’ll see a nearly identical opening tableau—the same dusty blue colors, the same architecture. 在《纪念碑谷1》中可以看到几乎一模一样的开始界面——相同的灰蓝色和相同的建筑。

Even Ro bears a striking resemblance to Ida, the main character from the original. Ro甚至和《纪念碑谷1》里的主要角色Ida惊人地相似。

But soon, you’ll notice all the differences. Ustwo set Monument Valley 2 in a different corner of the same universe.但是很快你就会发现不同之处。Ustwo将《纪念碑谷2》的场景设置在了同一宇宙的另一个角落。

It still revolves around solving architectural puzzles, which themselves feel manageable and familiar, but that’s where the similarities end. 游戏还是解决建筑难题，这部分还算熟悉，也可以应付，但二者的相似之处到此为止。

Monument Valley 2 is subtly more sophisticated than its predecessor. 《纪念碑谷2》比《纪念碑谷1》更精致、更复杂。

The biggest change, though, is the storyline. In the second scene of the game, you meet a new character: Ro’s tiny, nameless daughter, who accompanies her mother on the journey through the Valley. 最大的变化是故事情节。在第二个场景里你会认识一个新的角色：Ro的女儿，虽然没有名字，但这个小姑娘会陪着她的妈妈在碑谷里探险。

（翻译：红楼里的小石头）
